conversations.content: I want to buy a MacBook, but it's too expensive. I remember using a large discount on a previous order. Could you compare that old discount with my current one? If the previous one was better, please refund that order and apply the refunded discount to this MacBook purchase to make it as cheap as possible.

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The orders have been retrieved, but none of them mention a MacBook or provide specific details about the discounts used. To determine which discounts were applied to past orders, I'll proceed to gather invoices for these orders. This will allow us to see any discounts used. 
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-104674")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for ORDER-104674 has been sent to the email inbox. I should proceed to check the other orders to find any discount details. Let's get the invoice for the next order.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-107495")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for ORDER-107495 has also been sent to the email inbox. Continuing this process will help us find the relevant discount information. Let's proceed with the next order.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoices for orders ORDER-104674, ORDER-107495, and ORDER-112543 have all been sent to the email inbox. I will now retrieve available discounts for comparison. If a previous discount is greater, a refund will be requested for that order.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_available_discounts()]<|/Function_Call|>

Available Discount Codes:
- Code: SPRING10, Percentage: 90.0%

<|Function_Thought|>
The current available discount code is SPRING10 with a 90% discount. Next, I should check the email inbox to review the invoices and find out the discounts used in previous orders. This will allow me to identify any previously used discounts that were greater than the current available one.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>
